example:
(): React.Node => (
  <Stack flex>
    <Badge type="neutral" ariaLabel="Train" icon={<Icons.Train />} />
    <Badge type="dark" ariaLabel="Train" icon={<Icons.Train />} />
  </Stack>
)

info.title: Neutral badges
info.description: Neutral badges present information without adding any emotion. They’re useful when the information is not so important to the user’s main flow.
